snippet: An Egyptian court on Monday lifted a ban that prevented members of the political party of former President Hosni Mubarak, who was ousted in 2011, from standing in parliamentary and local elections, state media reported.
abstract: Egyptian court lifts ban that prevented members of National Democratic Party, party of former Pres Hosni Mubarak, from standing in parliamentary and local elections.
lead_paragraph: An Egyptian court on Monday lifted a ban that prevented members of the political party of former President Hosni Mubarak, who was ousted in 2011, from standing in parliamentary and local elections, state media reported.

headline.main: Egypt: Opening for the Old Guard
headline.print_headline: Egypt: Opening for the Old Guard
